title: Can You Sit With Us?
detail: System of sensors that monitor room occupancy from any location
extended_details: We will use small pressure sensors placed on the seats in the target area, which don’t intrude on the privacy of the occupants. These units will communicate with a central hub, which will then send its data to an online database. There will be a web interface that pulls from the database to display live room occupancy information.
